definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Schwannomas and neurofibromas are benign lesions that are thought to arise from neoplastic transformation of nerve sheath cells.
sentences.chinese: 前两者是良性肿瘤，一般认为来自神经鞘细胞的瘤变。

sentences.english: A histiocytoma in the dog is a benign tumor.
sentences.chinese: 犬的组织细胞瘤是一种良性肿瘤。

sentences.english: To provide a new thought to study on morphology of nevus .
sentences.chinese: 为研究皮肤良性肿瘤的形态学提供一种新的思路。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical feas ib ility of endoscopic resection of benign mammary tumors.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨腔镜切除乳腺良性肿瘤的可行性。

sentences.english: Conclusions Ovarian thecoma is a benign tumor with a favorable prognosis.
sentences.chinese: 结论卵巢卵泡膜细胞瘤属良性肿瘤，预后良好。

sentences.english: These noncancerous growths in the wall of the uterus rarely may be the cause of pain.
sentences.chinese: 这种长在子宫壁上的良性肿瘤可能会造成疼痛。

sentences.english: Parotidectomy with retaining facial nerve was done in treating benign tumor.
sentences.chinese: 对良性肿瘤采用保留面神经腮腺肿块全切。

sentences.english: Conclusions Dysplastic gangliocytoma of the cerebellum is a benign neoplasm, and has a preferable prognosis.
sentences.chinese: 结论小脑发育不良性节细胞瘤为良性肿瘤，预后良好。

sentences.english: Ameloblastoma is a common benign tumor occurring in the jaws.
sentences.chinese: 造釉细胞瘤是口腔颚面部常见的颚骨良性肿瘤。

sentences.english: Conclusion IP is a proliferous benign tumor.
sentences.chinese: 结论IP是有一定增殖活性的良性肿瘤。

sentences.english: Renal Cyst belongs to the benign tumor, someone classify is as Renal Sac Disease.
sentences.chinese: 肾囊肿属于良性肿瘤，有人将其归入肾囊性疾病。

sentences.english: Results The damage ratio of superficial nerve was lower after operations for parotid glands.
sentences.chinese: 结果浅叶及良性肿瘤术后面神经损伤率低。

sentences.english: A rare tumor (usually benign) derived from beta cells is called insulinoma. It results in recurrent and prolonged attacks of hypoglycemia.
sentences.chinese: 贝塔细胞的什么罕见的良性肿瘤会导致低血糖。

sentences.english: Uterine fibroids are the most common tumor in the female reproductive system.
sentences.chinese: 子宫肌瘤是女性生殖系统最常见的良性肿瘤。

sentences.english: The treatment of benign tumors is extirpation .
sentences.chinese: 良性肿瘤的治疗是摘除。

sentences.english: The benign tumor won't give you a deadly hurt.
sentences.chinese: 良性肿瘤不会对你有致命的伤害。

definition: to become cancerous/transformation to malignancy (of body cells)
